text: Conviction is a 2010 American legal drama movie. It is based on the story of Betty Anne Waters, a single mother trying to get her brother out of prison. Hilary Swank plays Betty Anne. Juliette Lewis plays Roseanna. Melissa Leo plays Nancy. This movie got positive reviews from movie critics. Category:American drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2010 drama movies Category:Movies set in prison
title: Conviction (movie)
